txt.en: Traits for your Soldier can be purchased and ranked up at a Skirmish Trainer for Skirmish Marks. A Skirmish Bard will allow you to slot your soldier traits. Attribute Traits determine the overall behaviour of the Soldier and set their appearance. Skill Traits give your Soldiers new combat abilities. Training Traits improve your Soldier's statistics. Personal Traits improve your statistics within Skirmishes.

Traits for your Soldier can be purchased and ranked up at a Skirmish Trainer for Marks. A Skirmish Bard will allow you to slot your soldier traits. Attribute Traits determine the overall behaviour of the Soldier and set their appearance. Skill Traits give your Soldiers new combat abilities. Training Traits improve your Soldier's statistics. Personal Traits improve your statistics within Skirmishes.
